website_summaries.verdict: The best long-lasting primer to keep skin hydrated and smooth under your foundation.
pros: Blurs blemishes when worn on its own, but wears well under makeup as well
Primer is oil-free and helps smooth out dry skin for flawless foundation application
Keeps makeup in place for hours
cons: Primer feels heavy on the skin initially

customer_reviews.title: Best Primer
customer_reviews.text: So many primers make my mineral makeup and lotions bunch up and get all caked and weird. This one keeps my fave looking smooth without making my face feel deprived of moisture. Highly recommend. (I have tried most brands sold at sephora... this one is best... better than Mac, philosophy, urban decay, nars, Bobbi brown, other bare minerals, drug store brands, Lancôme... and on. This one is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Busygirl

customer_reviews.title: Mock product, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the real product but a mock up. The consistency is thick, sticky, and smells strongly of chemicals. You'd be better off spending the extra few dollars that you save here and going to the store or bare minerals website to buy the real thing, because the difference is a stark contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hydrating primer
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few makeup primers that also hydrate the skin. My skin has become very dry and this is the first primer product that I feel helped with the dryness
customer_reviews.author: Slk

customer_reviews.title: Keeps BM foundation on longer and looks dewier
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer so much better than their others. I love that it's in a tube. The ones in pumps always jam up. I like that it helps my skin looks a little more dewey. Normally bare minerals powder is pretty matte in appearance. With this primer it lasts all day and I only touch up if I blow my nose. Other than that it stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: jess h

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I wear it every day under the BE tinted moisturizer and it does not make my sensitive skin break out. My makeup stays put all day, too.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Ive used their foundations and decided to try their wash and I’m glad I did! definitely seeing and feeling the benefits. my skin texture feels smoother. I use this once daily and trust me a very little squirt goes a long way. It lathers easily but not foamy or hard to get off. I expect to be using this product and brand for a long time
customer_reviews.author: vwmaribug

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually hydrates your face. A thin layer is all you need. I started using this when I noticed my concealer was peeling throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin in places and oily skin in others, so I'm constantly battling both issues. This product feels like it hydrates and mattes, so I do like that. As far as a great primer? Not so much, the Prime Time primer is a lot better. I just didn't see my make up staying on any longer than without this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Works well with BM Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well under my bareminerals foundation. It was perfect combo with DE antipollution serum. My makeup came out smooth and lasted long time versus using primer oil. Looks great in camera as well.. Im a fan forever. Thanks BM 😊
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating but a little thick
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer it’s just not really my favorite. I like a hydrating primer with a little slip to it and this one is a little thicker and doesn’t blend as easily. It does work and it does have a nice outcome it’s just the texture i don’t love.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this goes on and it provides a good foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Klapper

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I have very dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very good if you have dry skin. It’s thick. Smells great. Dries nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Another great bare minerals product. Goes on smooth, non clumping and doesnt flake. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carr

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I missed my return window on this product and now just have an item for the trash. This is way too thick for a primer. Liquid, gel, and powder foundation all cling and cake to it. Make up does not glide on but instead sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Am really surprised with results. My makeup looks even better than before. I've been using Bare Escentuals skin care for years, and this primer makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice face primer
customer_reviews.text: Nice face primer. Good product makes your face feel smooth and hydrated. Little or no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Gives mositure without making you greasy and makes pores less visitable
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Lightest, invisible primer
customer_reviews.text: I thought the box felt very light. Super disappointed that there was nothing in it! I've never been sent an empty box before!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Nellums

customer_reviews.title: Great texture!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't feel fake for those that say it's a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best primer
customer_reviews.text: My makeup is flawless with this primer; I will definitely keep using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful and makes your face break out.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awful. I thought it would help to make my makeup look smoother. However, it clogged my pores so bad that my face broke out worse than ever. I literally never break out but this stuff caused awful deep zits.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what this product is suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to diminish the appearance of large pores and as a good base for my foundation. I've used it several times now with no difference. Won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Elaine C

customer_reviews.title: It's a good hydrating primer
customer_reviews.text: I'm lookind forward to get this again. It's a white cream which when applied, it doesn't show a different color tone to my skin. I have dry cheeks so after I applied this to my face, my face havent been to dry since. It's a good hydrating primer.
customer_reviews.author: sia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Seem To Be of Quality for Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: The product goes on the skin more difficult than expected. It should go on smoothly. This product makes one pull their skin instead of glide.
customer_reviews.author: bannaner

customer_reviews.title: Always use this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Provides a smooth canvas for make up. Also has spf which I need.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Not s good Primer
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I wanted, the PRIMER I WANTED WAS CLEAR and went on silky smooth This is white and isn’t smooth at all
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: Tai Tumbarello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. It goes on smoothly, offers lasting moisture to my dry skin and my make up goes over it without a hitch. This is the best dry skin product I have used in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna York

product_meta.title: Bare Escentuals Good Hydrations Silky Face Primer 0
product_meta.description: This is an oil-free makeup primer that hydrates and nourishes dry, flaky skin to create a smooth canvas for the rest of your beauty routine. The built-in, soft-focus filter makes fine lines and pores virtually disappear.
feature_bullets: This is an oil-free makeup primer that hydrates and nourishes dry, flaky skin to create a smooth canvas for the rest of your beauty routine
The built-in, soft-focus filter makes fine lines and pores virtually disappear
It is oil-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free and fragrance-free

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
